import React,{useState} from 'react' import { Icon } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import {I18nProvider, LOCALES} from '../i18n'; import translate from '../i18n/translate'; const Home = () => { const [locale, setLocal] = useState(LOCALES.ENGLISH); return(




{translate('openhour')}:









{translate('monday')} 9 a.m ~ 7 p.m

{translate('sat')}: 11 a.m ~ 5 p.m

{translate('sun')}

{translate('about')}









{translate('explain')}

{translate('why1')}


{translate('why2')}













{translate('step1')}

{translate('step2')}

{translate('step3')}

{translate('step4')}





 ) } export default Home;
